name: Qliphort Genius
desc:
Link Arrows: [ðŸ¡·][ðŸ¡¶]

2 Machine monsters
This Link Summoned card is unaffected by Spell/Trap effects and by activated effects from other Link Monsters. Once per turn: You can target 1 other face-up card you control and 1 face-up card your opponent controls; both face-up cards have their effects negated until the end of this turn. When 2 monsters are Special Summoned at the same time to the zones this card points to (except during the Damage Step): You can add 1 Level 5 or higher Machine monster from your Deck to your hand.
